languages.text: {n}Глаз Соломона пробирает настолько сильный тик, что проктору приходится прижать веко железным пальцем.{/n} "Как же, сука, я ненавижу скоморохов и их драные вирши..."
{n}Solomorne's eye is seized by a tic so strong that he has to press an iron finger against the lid to stop it.{/n} "I... bloody... hate buffoons and their Throne-damned verses..."
languages.original_text: {n}Глаз Соломона пробирает настолько сильный тик, что проктору приходится прижать веко железным пальцем.{/n} "Как же, сука, я ненавижу скоморохов и их драные вирши..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne's eye is seized by a tic so strong that he has to press an iron finger the eyelid.{/n} "I — bloody — hate buffoons and their Throne-damned verses..."

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙的眼睛抽搐起来，不得不举起铁手，用力按住自己的眼睑。{/n}“我……真他妈……痛恨小丑……和他们的操蛋烂诗……”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eye is seized by a tic so strong that he has to press an iron finger against the lid to stop it.{/n} "I... bloody... hate buffoons and their Throne-damned verses..."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙的眼睛抽搐起来，不得不举起铁手，用力按住自己的眼睑。{/n}“我……真他妈……痛恨小丑……和他们的操蛋烂诗……”

languages.text: {n}A Solomorne le entra un tic tan intenso en el ojo que tiene que llevarse uno de sus férreos dedos al párpado para contenerlo.{/n} «Odio... a los bufones... y sus versos malditos por el Trono...».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eye is seized by a tic so strong that he has to press an iron finger against the lid to stop it.{/n} "I... bloody... hate buffoons and their Throne-damned verses..."

traits.locale_text: {n}A Solomorne le entra un tic tan intenso en el ojo que tiene que llevarse uno de sus férreos dedos al párpado para contenerlo.{/n} «Odio... a los bufones... y sus versos malditos por el Trono...».

languages.text: {n}L'œil de Solomorne est saisi d'un tic nerveux si important qu'il est contraint de porter sa main métallique au visage.{/n} « Je déteste... ces satanés bouffons et leurs fichues rimes... »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eye is seized by a tic so strong that he has to press an iron finger against the lid to stop it.{/n} "I... bloody... hate buffoons and their Throne-damned verses..."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'œil de Solomorne est saisi d'un tic nerveux si important qu'il est contraint de porter sa main métallique au visage.{/n} « Je déteste... ces satanés bouffons et leurs fichues rimes... »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの目があまりにも激しいけいれんを起こし、彼はそれを止めるために鉄の指でまぶたを押さえなければならなかった。{/n}「俺は…くそっ…道化と奴らの玉座を呪う詩が心底嫌いなんだ…」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eye is seized by a tic so strong that he has to press an iron finger against the lid to stop it.{/n} "I... bloody... hate buffoons and their Throne-damned verses..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの目があまりにも激しいけいれんを起こし、彼はそれを止めるために鉄の指でまぶたを押さえなければならなかった。{/n}「俺は…くそっ…道化と奴らの玉座を呪う詩が心底嫌いなんだ…」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un gözü o kadar şiddetli bir şekilde seğiriyor ki durdurmak için demir parmağını göz kapağına bastırmak zorunda kalıyor.{/n} "Bu kahrolasıca şaklabanlardan ve onların lanet dizelerinden nefret ediyorum..."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eye is seized by a tic so strong that he has to press an iron finger against the lid to stop it.{/n} "I... bloody... hate buffoons and their Throne-damned verses..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un gözü o kadar şiddetli bir şekilde seğiriyor ki durdurmak için demir parmağını göz kapağına bastırmak zorunda kalıyor.{/n} "Bu kahrolasıca şaklabanlardan ve onların Tahtları lanetlenesice dizelerinden nefret ediyorum..."

languages.text: {n}Solomornes Auge zuckt so stark, dass er einen Eisenfinger auf das Lid drücken muss, um dagegen anzukommen.{/n} "Ich ... verdammt ... hasse Dummköpfe und ihre – der Thron sei verdammt – Verse ..."
